document_data.name: Maalirn's Walk
document_data.mainbody: '''Maalirn's Walk''' was a north–south road bordering the eastern side of the Dukar Quarter of [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.Geography: The road arched in places with links to the [[Dukars' Academy]], and was popular with younger [[merfolk]] who enjoyed racing along it, despite the hazards.
